allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Edge Knowledge Hunter skill

- AI驱动的边缘知识挖掘系统
- 支持多个高价值论坛爬取
- 智能浏览器自动化 + 视觉识别
- 三层分析：边缘知识、骚人、资源

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add English README and configuration documentation

- Add README_EN.md \(English version\)
- Add detailed documentation for forum_database.json usage
- Add detailed documentation for memory.json.template usage
- Explain configuration file structure and privacy notes
- Update both Chinese and English READMEs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
